summary: Morthal addons such as wall and store
descriptionHtml:
-v0.3 coming soon to fix bookshelves in Mistwater, and add 3 guards to the gates
-v0.2 added, more changes to come
-Creation Kit (CK) fixed and v0.2 will be added shortly
-New Pictures added!

Do you think Morthal is a pathetic excuse for a hold capital but think it has potential? Do you want a mod to add the necessities of a town but keep the same feel? Do you like Morthal Redone but think its too extensive for a capital so close to solitude?

You have come to the right place.
_____________            
/\\/\\ ( ) R I /\\ I__
R 3 I\\I ( ) \\/ /\\ I 3 D
_____________________
This does all that in a way that I think Morthal should have been originally,
This mod adds:
 -A wall similar to Falkreath or Riverwood with tapestries, gates, and gate torches
 -A general store to the building called Thaumaturgist\'s Hut which I like to call the Morthal Mall. It takes up the top floor and remodels it so that it looks like a general store
 -Adds a new NPC argonian named, appropiately, Likes-To-Sell who has a daily routine of going between the tavern and his store from 8 to 10, in which time he sells his wares. He has a relationship as Derkeethus\'s cousin and is the argonian from the loading screen.
 -Adds a forge, tanning rack, and grindstone to the guard house exterior 
 -Adds a house called Mistwater in a place which looks like it should be there

.............a)Mistwater comes with Navmesh so should allow followers (does not will add v0.4)
.............b)Adds an alchemy station and Enchanting station
.............c)Adds 4 divine shrines and a nicely placed shrine to Nocturnal
.............d)Adds cooking pot, bed, safe containers, displays, and shelves
.............e)WARNING: displays do not yet work nor do bookshelves, (fixed in v0.3)
............f)Awesome interior decorating in my opinion because of the basement alcove (refer to pic!) 

 -Adds a workbench to Mistwater exterior
 -Adds a shrine to Talos In the corner of the city, behind Mistwater

This mod works well with the normal routine and quests of the people of Morthal and I recommend adding Lesser Hold Stables:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16713
Drinking fountains of skyrim:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24282
And carts in each big town:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8434
See my other mod The Adventurers Camps which is compatible:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32296/

Compatability: Should work with most mods but those which adds anything where the wall or forge is. Will test various mods: 
Morthal Redone - no
Morthal Legacy - no, the player home conflicts with the East wall
Enhanced Cities Morthal - yes (so far) and recommended, though youll have two forges haha!
Morthal player home - no 
Morthal\'s Ghastly Mine - yes
Morthal Hall - eh, no but so close if you want it, just delete the workbench and grindstone from his or the barrels and forge from mine
Morthal Fortified - no
And last but not least,
Jarl goat of Morthal - yes haha of course!
___________________________________________

upgrade: just pull everything out of Mistwater and uninstall, then install V0.2
___________________________________________
Future upgrades: Housecarl Marissa Bearheart  
                         Make it a thane house 
                         Add a guard to the wall (v0.4)
                         fix Mistwater   
                         Add a shrine to Arkay and a priest of Arkay 

Thank you and please, Comment and add suggestions on anything you would like to see in Morthal and ill see what i can do!
